title: Degree Advanced Antiperspirant Deodorant Shower Clean, 48-Hour Sweat & Odor Protection Antiperspirant for Women with MotionSense Technology 2.6 oz(Pack of 6)
description: Degree is upgrading to our best formula yet. Our new and improved formulation gives you 72 hours of nonstop sweat and odor protection. You will still find all the same fragrances you know and love, but now with our new and improved long lasting protection! For a limited time, you may still receive our old 48-hour formulation while all our new 72-hour products make their way to a store near you. For the details of these changes, scroll down to see a full list of ingredients. Degree Advanced Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers nonstop protection, so you can face the day with confidence. This antiperspirant for women features 72-hour sweat and odor protection and the bright floral scent of rose and jasmine, blended with delicate fruit for an invigorating, clean feeling. Only Degree has MotionSense technology that moves in sync with your body. This antiperspirant deodorant spray releases a burst of subtle fragrance every time you move, for nonstop protection. Degree Advanced Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps you feeling fresher, drier, and more confident. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most so that you don't have to worry about slowing down. Simply swipe and start moving.
